div.h1: Clear Creek Amana Community School District

div.class: ui-clear facebook-true youtube-true twitter-true pinterest-false vimeo-false flickr-false linkedin-true instagram-false

div.span: The mission of the Clear Creek Amana Community School District is to prepare students to be productive, responsible, community members by providing an environment that inspires quality life-long learning.
